ValidationRule.description: Make the Account Name, Industry, Billing Name DBA, full Billing/shipping addresses and Company Type fields required to save a record.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR ( ISBLANK( BillingStreet), ISBLANK( BillingCity ), ISBLANK( BillingState ), ISBLANK( BillingPostalCode ), ISBLANK( BillingCountry ), ISBLANK( ShippingStreet ), ISBLANK( ShippingCity ), ISBLANK( ShippingState ), ISBLANK( ShippingPostalCode ), ISBLANK( ShippingCountry ), ISBLANK( F52_BusinessNameDBA__c ), ISBLANK( text(F52_CustomerType__c) )), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Billing Name DBA, full Billing/shipping addresses and Company Type fields are required to save a record.
